issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Yazdgerd II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap, crescent, above covered korymbos; two ribbons commencing to the left below crescent, pointing upwards; pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing below ball of hair, pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); floral elements below bust; floral elements below bust; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: no legend; symbol in front of bust (SNS 3, Var.42)
